Articles.Content:
We tried to stop him...

![gh3lmdu.png](http://i.imgur.com/gh3lmdu.png)

![0U44kOl.png](http://i.imgur.com/0U44kOl.png)

Rules:

\* Get him back on the runway ASAP safe in "this" [https://www.dropbox.com/s/euk7jjpq2h7xo8b/FUN%20%21%21%21.craft?dl=0](https://www.dropbox.com/s/euk7jjpq2h7xo8b/FUN%20%21%21%21.craft?dl=0)

\* Don't change the "this" plane what so ever...

\* Fastest time gets on top. (no rules on mods)

\* Prove it with screenshots (you know the drill.)

\* Xtra kudos if your pilot is named Scott Manley.

\* 1.000.000. K (kerbin dollars) If you can land Scott on K2 mountain !

Hints: Don't try to take off before the end of the runway.(and you have chutes for landing...) 

It actualy flies pretty easy (when you get the hang of it ![k_smiley.gif](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/images/smilies/k_smiley.gif))

"I saved Scott superfast !"

#1 -your name here-

#2 -your name here-

#3 -your name here-

"I landed Scott on K2 !"

#1 -your name here-

#2 -who am I kidding...

#3 -DNQ !

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/qo3iQvnisTk?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

I will check this daily, if someone could design a badge for this that would be awesome.

Now go and SAVE SCOTT ! ! !

 Fly safe !
